name: Anywhere You've Been
description:
A short game where you wander through a local park and collect the stories of the queer people who have been there before you.

Controls

Arrows to move
Space to jump
C to interact

Credits

Created by Becca Miller

  • Sound and music provided by WeLoveIndies: https://www.weloveindies.com/
  • Free 2D Block Forest Tile Pack by MikeMac2D: https://opengameart.org/content/free-2d-block-forest-tile-pack
  • Wooden benches by Hyptosis & Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge): https://opengameart.org/content/wooden-benches-mage-city-arcanos-rework
  • Handpainted platform tilset by LudicArts: https://opengameart.org/content/handpainted-platform-tileset
  • Flowering herbs in isometic view by Hansjörg Malthaner: http://opengameart.org/users/varkalandar
  • Pixel character with gun by Bonsaiheldin: https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-character-with-gun
  • Plants Flowers Pixer by Rzrcoon: https://opengameart.org/content/plants-flowers-pixer
